channel.title: Elite Coders, I Need Help :(
channel.description:
okay how do i..
Take Out Commands i dont want. Change the bonus's of items. And Slow down xp. ( such as if i hit a door i get 80 xp, howould i get it down to 40..?)
Thank You So Much! -Ashley / D Scim Ftw <3

item.title: Elite Coders, I Need Help :(
item.dc:creator: @Tr1pl3k1ll Tr1pl3k1ll
item.description:
@Tr1pl3k1ll wrote:

Search the command in your client.java, and delete the process their.
Change the bonus of the item, go to item list and read a little bit, im sure you can figure that out.
And change the exp, um I forget how but im sure if you go to client.java and CTRL + F something like add.Exp you eill pull up some stuff.

  • TR1p
